Package com.codekutter.genesis.pipelines

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Pipeline<T>
    Interface to be implemented by Data Pipelines.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicPipeline<T>
    Basic Pipeline type - Pipeline executed processors on an entity instance.
    BasicProcessor<T>
    Basic Abstract processor class to operate on entities.
    CollectionPipeline<T>  
    CollectionProcessor<T>
    Abstract base class to process a set of entity data.
    CollectionProcessorResponse<T>
    Response handle type for CollectionProcessors/CollectionPipelines.
    Context
    A Context handle that can be passed around within an execution context.
    ExceptionProcessor<T>
    Pipeline Exception Response processor.
    PipelineLoader
    Loader class to read and parse pipeline definitions from a configuration.
    Processor<T>
    Abstract base class for defining processors.
    ProcessorResponse<T>
    Response object returned by process executions.
    ProcessState
    State handle for storing the state/exceptions, for the process instance.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EProcessorResponse
    Enumeration to define processor response states.
    EProcessState
    Enumeration to define the states of a process instance.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ProcessorException
    Exception instance used to raise error in processing requests.
